name: panda-cash
description: The vision of Panda Cash is to make Bitcoin Cash easily accessible to every developer.

scripts.start: npm run start:node && npm run start:api
scripts.start:node: docker rm bch-regtest && docker run -it --name bch-regtest -p 18332:18332 slashrsm/bitcoin-cash-regtest:latest
scripts.start:bitbox: NETWORK=mainnet BITCOINCOM_BASEURL=https://test.bch.api.bitcoindotcom.net/api/ RPC_BASEURL=http://127.0.1.0:18332 RPC_PASSWORD=regtest RPC_USERNAME=regtest ZEROMQ_PORT=0 ZEROMQ_URL=0 BITDB_TOKEN=0 node ./node_modules/bitbox-sdk/index.js
scripts.console: NETWORK=mainnet BITCOINCOM_BASEURL=https://test.bch.api.bitcoindotcom.net/api/ RPC_BASEURL=http://127.0.1.0:18332 RPC_PASSWORD= RPC_USERNAME=bitcoin ZEROMQ_PORT=0 ZEROMQ_URL=0 BITDB_TOKEN=0 node ./node_modules/bitbox-sdk/index.js console
scripts.start:api: BITCOINCOM_BASEURL=http://localhost:3000/api/ RPC_BASEURL=http://127.0.1.0:18332/ RPC_PASSWORD=regtest RPC_USERNAME=regtest ZEROMQ_PORT=0 ZEROMQ_URL=0 NETWORK=local node ./node_modules/rest.bitcoin.com/app.js
